name: Choco Slash Muffin Fever - The Cooking Slice Mania Cafe
name_original: Choco Slash Muffin Fever - The Cooking Slice Mania Cafe
description:
Dive into the delicious world of Chocolate and Donuts and indulge yourself in the most sumptuous mouth watering Puzzle Game ever! Slice, snap, dribble and munch your way through 50 levels of yummy chocolate bar heaven testing your drool reaction skills as you go.

In this super dreamy puzzler game, your aim is to keep all the treats together by slicing away at each flavoured level and avoid being devoured.

Need help munching?..I doubt it..but just in case why not head over to the power store and grab yourself some time warps, instant wipe outs and super bombs all waiting for the choc fanatics who just wanna melt into the next level. Get your game up the levels and go gooey big time in Game Centre.

Features:

- 50 Great levels of Chocolate Awesomeness
- Super Cool Power up Store for all your Extra Goodies
- Coin Store
- Game Centre Leaderboards
